name: Northern Fjordlands
economy_niches: Re-export of inland goods via sheltered fjord harbors
Supply node for ritual-reagent collectors and packers
culture_adjustments: Stronger clan/local-cove identities over provincial loyalty
More conservative seamanship ritesâ€”age-grade initiation extended
Wider use of Highland Cant loanwords in remote coves
Ancestor veneration focused on sea-bound lineages (boat tombs)
constraints: Scarce arable land limits grain production
Harbors seasonally ice-locked; shipping window constrained
Ritual magic reliant on imported reagents via precarious routes
notes: Important source of kelp-based reagents used statewide
Local navigational auguries strong but cannot replace charts
